archimate:Principle.name: <<ELAP:ArchitecturePrinciple>> Best fit Public Service Implementation Orientation
archimate:Principle.documentation: http://data.europa.eu/2sa/elap/best-fit-public-service-implementation-orientation The implementation of digital public services has a focus on integration, technology, governance or legal. Rationale Experience shows that a focused approach is a critical success factor in the implementation of digital public services. Principle Source COM(2017) 134 final ANNEX 2 COMMUNICATION FROM THE COMMISSION TO THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, THE COUNCIL, THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL COMMITTEE AND THE COMMITTEE OF THE REGIONS European Interoperability Framework - Implementation Strategy
